short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Import applicants from LinkedIn, Behance, Github, Twitter, etc. to your Welcome Kit job listings.
short.cs: Importujte uchazeče ze služeb LinkedIn, Behance, Github, Twitter apod. ke svým nabídkám práce na Welcome Kitu.
short.es: Importa fácilmente los candidatos de LinkedIn, Behance, Github, Twitter, etc. a tus ofertas Welcome Kit.
short.fr: Importez facilement des candidats depuis Linkedin, Behance, Github, Twitter, etc. vers vos offres Welcome Kit.
short.sk: Importujte kandidátov z LinkedIn, Behance, Github, Twitter atď. k svojim pracovným ponukám v nástroji Welcome Kit.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Shortlist candidates from Linkedin, Viadeo, Behance, Github, Twitter, etc. to your WelcomeKit job offers.
long.cs,es,fr,sk: Importez facilement des candidats depuis Linkedin, Viadeo, Behance, Dribbble, Github, Stackoverflow, Twitter, Facebook, etc. vers vos offres Welcome Kit.
